TOKEN

Welcome

This is an internal currency in all existing projects in the Smart Team ecosystem. Gradually the token will be introduced in all our and partner projects as a payment method.

Description

SMART ALHFA TOKEN

This is an internal currency in all existing projects in the Smart Team ecosystem. For example, this token can be used to buy NFT Smart Tigers, to pay for commissions in the Resale Market, but the main purpose of this token will be to pay for promotion and additional services in Smart Working.

NFT-collection of 4999+ unique tigers, which represent their community, helping the project to progress more and more every day. The collection can be upgraded from 2D to 3D and you can also add your own inscriptions and logos. This project aims to develop and develop new technologies and utilities on the TON blockchain.

Purpose of SmartTigers
-

Our purpose is to make their product a tool that can help people in their field of work, as well as attract an audience of more than 1 million users to Smart Team projects.

Smart Working

A platform that will enable you to promote your services, find colleagues, investors and much more. SmartWorking - this is the future auxiliary tool of any IT specialist, a tool that will help with information, and most importantly with connections. Authorization on the platform is planned to be NFT SmartTigers, and the internal currency is Smarttoken.

Smart TON

Private SMARTTON Community Club. The primary source of news about our projects, direct communication with the team. Discuss The Open Network, share useful information. Only NFT Smart Tigers holders are allowed to join.

Smart Team

A team of developers who can not only well create Telegram bots, websites and attract traffic, but also build a quality crypto project on TON, which is what we do.
